title: Metal Bastard's Best of 2008
description:
Tracks from the best 25 albums of 2008 according to the now-funct blog Metal Bastard. Nowadays kindly check metalbastard[dot]tumblr[dot]com for all of your musical needs.

This torrent features:

Amon Amarth
Bleeding Through
Bloodbath
BringTheWarHome
Cult of Luna
Darkane
Darkthrone
Dozer
Dungen
Eagles of Death Metal
Earth
Gojira
The Haunted
Haust
The Hellacopters
Krisiun
Lords of Bastard
The Mars Volta
The Melvins
Metallica
Muga
Opeth
Satyricon
Slipknot
Unearthly Trance
